page.title: 18MARCUS COX _ SUNDAY SURVEY
page.content: My name is{Marcus Cox,}I am{12 years {old}and I live at{Garden Cottage, {Wyastone Leys (533157).}My house lies next to the{River Wye,}with a large meadow in front and some forest behind. During the weekend{15-16 June 1985 I counted the people I saw using the{ {Wye Valley Walk}as they passed my house. On the Sunday I counted a total of{6 wakkers, 2 joggers}and a{rambling {party}of about {20 people.}On the River there were{3 canoeists}who passed through the area and{1 sculler} who returned later. During the weekend the weather was mainly sunny with occasional cloud. There was no rain.
